name: Klede Movies
description:
Klede Movies game is quite complete and covers some of the current movies as well as old successful ones :
* Echer Level has a specific number (between 20 and 30 ) of soundtrack questions.
* Questions of each Level are updated weekly.
* To go from a level to the next one you should have a score of 100%
* Play and listen to the soundtrack carefully
* You can share your score with your friends

Enjoy!
